XII.i.3.D.2.c
.
Notifying the Claimant Regarding FEGLI Benefits
Contact the claimant to
provide notice of the action taken when the request is sent to the OPM to
avoid piecemeal development, and
keep the claimant informed of possible delays, and
request evidence if there is evidence which could be supplied by the claimant without expense or undue expenditure of time and effort.
Note
:  If it is readily apparent that FEGLI is not payable and, therefore, not a bar, do not request evidence from the claimant.
Important
:  This development does not preclude any other development necessary to obtain records or evidence from other sources, such as those available through Personal Information Exchange System.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section D - Awards Barred by Receipt of Federal Employees' Group Life Insurance (FEGLI)
citation: Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section D
